title: shrngAra rasamanjarIm
sahitya:
shrngAra rasamanjarIm shrI kAmAkSIm gaurIm shritajana kalpavallIm cintayEham


caraNam   angArakAdi graha dOSa nivAraNa karIm ananga kusumAdi shakti priyakarIm dvi-saptati rAgAnga 
rAga mOdinIm matanga bharata vEdinIm mangaLa dAyinIm rasika pungava guruguha jananIm
